ALL_STRAWB_INTERVENTION: Collect all strawberries in the Intervention sequence
BEFORE_DREAMBLOCKS: Get to the room prior to Intervention cutscene before activating dream blocks
5_BERRY_PICO8: Find Celeste PICO-8 and collect 5 berries in it
PRESIDENTIAL_ALL_STRAWB: Collect all strawberries in the Presidential Suite sequence
HIDDEN_PATH_CLIFF_FACE: Take the hidden path to Cliff Face
THEO_CUTSCENE: Activate the Theo cutscene in the Search sequence
CRYSTAL_THEO_STRAWB: Collect the strawberry during the crystal Theo sequence
4_SIDES_KEVIN: Hit all 4 sides of a single Kevin Block
ALL_FEATHERS_DREAM: Collect all feathers in the dream sequence
ALL_FEATHERS_ROOM: Collect all feathers in the room before Old Lady
